attributes.action: Parliament should not make full Single Market membership a condition of Brexit
attributes.additional_details:
Think tank Open Europe found that:

"If the UK were to opt for a Norwegian-style relationship it would still be bound by great swathes of the EU...but – and this is the crucial point – without any vote on it...If the UK were to ‘become like Norway’ by joining EEA,  93 out of the 100 costliest EU-derived regulations would remain in place at a cost of £31.4bn per year (94.3% of the total cost)."

http://openeurope.org.uk/today/blog/what-would-a-norway-style-relationship-with-the-eu-entail/
